activities: Gogo processes personal information for users of its voice and data related services in connection with providing them with such services and offers that may be of interest to them based on their use of the Gogo service. Gogo also processes employee human resources information for business and legal compliance purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For non-HR data, Gogo will use TRUSTe as its independent recourse mechanism.  For HR data, Gogo will cooperate with EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
